EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Testing On Cloud 9 with TaaS - 2015.04.22.Email - Last Call Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Wednesday: Testing on Cloud 9 with Tosca as a Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Testing On Cloud 9 with Tosca as a Service (TaaS)
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
The Cloud is changing the world of computing - and for good reason. Utilizing the cloud allows you to scale projects up or down quickly, easily issue software updates, and work on projects from anywhere in the world that offers an internet connection.
Join us for our newest webinar, “Testing on Cloud 9 with Tosca as a Service.” Tricentis’ own Michael Niessl, the Product Owner of TaaS, will give an introduction to Tosca as a Service, including a comprehensive live demo showing how Tosca as a Service (TaaS) integrates all the features of Tosca you love with the ease and convenience of the cloud.
Our “Testing on Cloud 9 with Tosca as a Service” webinar will take place on April 22, 2015, starting at 4:00 p.m. CET.
We look forward to seeing you at the webinar!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-testing-on-cloud-9-with-taas.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-testing-on-cloud-9-with-taas.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Wed, Apr 22, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CET 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EST
Michael Niessl TaaS Product Owner Tricentis
